title: Genmai Harmony
description: Serves meat, veg options available. July 2014 reported added meat and is no longer pure vegan. "Brown Rice Harmony" offers some vegan Japanese food, curry, and cake. For around 1300 yen you get a set meal that is filling. Also sells some cooking supplies including seitan. Nice atmosphere. Kitchen breaks in afternoon before dinner service. 大阪市淀川区西中島4-8-1 (西中島南方駅から、西に、１ばんち行って).
